name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.slowdisk.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a disk is definitely not slow.

name: io.file.buffer.size
description:
The size of buffer for use in sequence files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: dfs.namenode.blocks.per.postponedblocks.rescan
description:
Number of blocks to rescan for each iteration of
    postponedMisreplicatedBlocks.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.expire-after-access-minutes
description:
The length of time after an entry is last accessed that it
    should be automatically removed.

name: fs.s3a.connection.establish.timeout
description: Socket connection setup timeout in milliseconds.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the RM/HS before
    throwing exception. This is a layer above the ipc.
